onboarding.onboarding_1_description: Get access to a huge library of movies to suit all tastes. You will surely like it.
onboarding.onboarding_1_title: Find Your Next Favorite Movie Here
onboarding.onboarding_2_description: Discover a vast collection of all qualities and genres. Find your next favorite film with ease.
onboarding.onboarding_3_description: Discover movies from every genre, in all available qualities. Find something new and exciting to watch every day.
onboarding.onboarding_4_description: Save movies to your watchlist to keep track of what you want to watch next. Enjoy films in various qualities and genres.
onboarding.onboarding_5_description: Share your thoughts on the movies you've watched. Dive deep into film details and help others discover great movies with your reviews.
